title: {{appname}} Demo
lead: You want to see the app in action but don't have time to add your product definitions, materials etc.. just to see what it can do? You can use our demo database and see for yourself.
warningText: This action will delete all your existing data. Please make sure you have downloaded your backup file if you dont want to lose any data.

error: Unable to load demo data. Please contact us if the problem persists

lemonade.title: The Lemonade Company
lemonade.scenario:
In this scenario, you are the director of a successful lemonade stand. You have a variety of lemonade recipes. 

After producing your lemonades, you have 3 kinds of packaging available to create end-user products. You have .33L cup for drinking on the spot, 0.5L bottle and 20L barrel options for taking home. You of course employ a labor force (probably mom) for manufacturing. 

Load this scenario to check your expenses and product costs!

supplement.title: Mega Nutrition!
supplement.scenario: In this scenario, you run a supplement manufacturer! You manufacture vitamin tablets and sport drinks. Load this scenario now to see how that would work!
